description: Orders of Weyl groups of type E_n.
references: J. H. Conway, R. T. Curtis, S. P. Norton, R. A. Parker and R. A. Wilson, ATLAS of Finite Groups. Oxford Univ. Press, 1985.
J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 120.
H. S. M. Coxeter and W. O. J. Moser, Generators and Relations for Discrete Groups, 4th ed., Springer-Verlag, NY, reprinted 1984.
prog: (MAGMA) [ #CoxeterGroup(Sprintf("E%o",n)) : n in [6..8]]; - from Sergei Haller (sergei(AT)sergei-haller.de), Dec 21 2006
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
